column4: Hi alll.....I just installed " apt-get install kde " in 7.04 , what should i do nest to have my ubuntu start in GUI mode and how do i  start the kde ?
if you want a complete system targetted towards KDE install this: kubuntu-desktop
: ok , but then i need all the guidance on how to start the service and bboot in gui everytime i log in , will i need to edit any file
I believe that you just have to install that one package and you'd be done
